Question: How do I reset my SSO password?
Resolution: Navigate to https://sso.acme-corp.com/reset and follow the MFA prompts. Note: Passwords must be 12+ characters with a symbol.

Question: My account is locked. What do I do?
Resolution: Accounts lock after 5 failed attempts. Please wait 15 minutes for an auto-unlock or contact IT via Slack for immediate reset.

Question: I didn't receive my MFA push notification.
Resolution: Ensure your phone has an internet connection. Try using the 'Enter Code' offline option in your Authenticator app.

Question: What is the staff Wi-Fi password?
Resolution: Staff Wi-Fi uses your SSO credentials. Connect to 'ACME-Staff' and enter your corporate username and password.

Question: How do I connect guests to Wi-Fi?
Resolution: Guests should use 'ACME-Guest'. No password required but they must accept the Terms and Conditions in the pop-up browser.

Question: My VPN connection is very slow.
Resolution: Switch to a wired connection if possible. If on Wi-Fi try moving closer to the router or disconnect other high-bandwidth devices.

Question: How do I update my email signature?
Resolution: Go to File > Options > Mail > Signatures. Use the official company template found on the Intranet under 'Brand Identity'.

Question: My microphone is not working in Teams.
Resolution: Check 'Device Settings' in Teams and ensure the correct input device is selected. Test your mic in the system sound settings.

Question: Where are my Zoom cloud recordings stored?
Resolution: Recordings are synced to your 'My Documents/Zoom' folder and also available at https://zoom.acme-corp.com/recordings.

Question: My laptop battery drains very quickly.
Resolution: Reduce screen brightness; close background apps like Chrome or Slack when not in use. If the battery health is below 80% request a replacement.

Question: My external monitor looks blurry.
Resolution: Ensure you are using a high-quality DisplayPort or HDMI cable. In Windows/Mac settings set the resolution to 'Native' (e.g. 1920x1080).

Question: My peripherals won't connect through the dock.
Resolution: Unplug the USB-C/Thunderbolt cable from your laptop and the power from the dock. Wait 10 seconds and reconnect both.

Question: I need admin rights to install software.
Resolution: Standard software can be installed via the 'Self-Service Portal'. For other apps submit a 'Temporary Admin Rights' request in Slack.

Question: I think I received a phishing email.
Resolution: Do not click any links. Forward the email to phishing-report@acme-corp.com and then delete it from your inbox.

Question: My disk is almost full.
Resolution: Use 'Disk Cleanup' (Windows) or 'Storage Management' (Mac) to remove temp files. Move large project files to the cloud (OneDrive/Box).

Question: How do I share my screen in the meeting room?
Resolution: Connect the HDMI cable to your laptop or use the wireless 'ShareLink' code displayed on the room's TV screen.

Question: How do I connect to the VPN?
Resolution:
1. Download Cisco AnyConnect from https://vpn.acme-corp.com/downloads
2. Install the app
3. Connect to vpn.acme-corp.com
4. Enter your SSO credentials and MFA

Question: VPN won't connect
Resolution:
1. Check internet connection
2. Verify VPN URL is vpn.acme-corp.com
3. Try disabling firewall temporarily
4. Clear AnyConnect cache: delete C:\ProgramData\Cisco\Cisco AnyConnect (Windows) or ~/Library/Application Support/Cisco (Mac)

Question: VPN error code 0x80041002
Resolution: DNS Resolution Failure. Check if vpn.acme-corp.com resolves. Flush DNS: 'ipconfig /flushdns' (Windows) or 'sudo killall -HUP mDNSResponder' (Mac)

Question: VPN error 0x80070057
Resolution: Invalid parameter/MTU issue. Lower MTU to 1300: 'netsh interface ipv4 set subinterface "VPN" mtu=1300 store=persistent'

Question: How do I unmute the microphone in the meeting room?
Resolution: Press the microphone button on the Logitech Rally speaker (center of table). LED will turn green when unmuted.

Question: How to start a Zoom meeting in the conference room?
Resolution: Tap 'Start Meeting' on the iPad controller. Or tap 'Join' and enter the meeting ID

Question: How do I request a new laptop?
Resolution: Submit a request via ServiceNow (https://acme.service-now.com) under Hardware > New Device Request. Include business justification. Approval required from manager and IT.

Question: Can I upgrade my laptop?
Resolution: Laptops are replaced on a 3-year cycle. Early upgrades require VP approval and valid business case (e.g. performance bottleneck for critical work)

Question: My screen is cracked
Resolution: 1 accidental damage event covered per year. Submit ticket with photos. AppleCare or Dell ProSupport will arrange repair (typically 2-3 business days)

Question: What laptop models are available?
Resolution: Tier A (Engineering): MacBook Pro 14" M3 Pro, 36GB RAM. Tier B (Business): MacBook Air 13" M3 16GB or Dell Latitude 5440

Question: How do I install software?
Resolution: Use Self-Service portal (https://self-service.acme-corp.com). Pre-approved software can be installed directly. Custom software requires IT security review (submit ticket)

Question: I need admin rights to install software
Resolution: Standard users don't have admin rights for security. Use Self-Service portal for approved apps, or submit ticket explaining business need for custom software

Question: My printer is offline
Resolution:
1. Check power - ensure printer screen is on
2. Verify network - printer should be on 'ACME-Devices' WiFi
3. Reset queue - delete stuck print jobs and restart printer

Question: Printer paper jam
Resolution: Follow on-screen instructions on printer LCD showing jam location (Door A, Tray 2, etc.). Open indicated door and remove jammed paper with both hands. Close firmly.

Question: How do I add a printer?
Resolution: macOS: System Settings > Printers & Scanners > Add Printer (appears under Bonjour if on corporate WiFi). Windows: Settings > Printers & scanners > Add device

Issue: How to set up my VPN?
Question: How to set up my VPN?
Resolution: To establish a secure remote connection, ensure your workstation is equipped with the latest Pulse Secure client (v9.1R15+) and that your user account has been provisioned within the 'VPN-Access' Active Directory group. The configuration requires pointing the client to the primary gateway at vpn.acme-corp.com, utilized alongside a split-tunneling routing policy that prioritizes 10.0.0.0/8 traffic while maintaining local breakout for public internet services. Authentication is strictly enforced via a dual-factor handshake involving corporate LDAP credentials followed by a mandatory SAML 2.0-based PingID push notification, supplemented by a pre-connection 'Host Checker' compliance scan to verify local disk encryption and real-time antivirus definitions.

Question: My laptop battery drains really fast, like in 2 hours.
Resolution: Reduce screen brightness. Close resource-intensive background applications (e.g., web browsers, Slack). Check laptop battery health status. If reported battery health is below 80%, escalate ticket for battery replacement initiation.
